---
title: "Binomial 10 Results Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rbinom-0.1-10.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Binom0.1.10Call <- stream_in(file("rbinom-0.1-10-Call-Revised-1211.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Binom0.1.10Result <- stream_in(file("rbinom-0.1-10-1211_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Binom.01.10.OpenAI <- left_join(Binom0.1.10Call,Binom0.1.10Result)
Full.Binom.01.10 <- left_join(Binom0.1.10$params, Binom.01.10.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Binom.01.10.1211.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Binom.01.10$Outcome <- map_chr(Binom0.1.10$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Binom0.1.10Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Binom.01.10$Outcome)
Full.Binom.01.10.1211 <- Full.Binom.01.10
```

```{r}
save(Full.Binom.01.10.1211, file="Full.Binom.01.10.1211.RData")
```
